text: Alfredo HÃ©lio Syrkis (8 December 1950 - 10 July 2020) was a Brazilian writer, environmentalist and politician. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He ran for president under the Green Party ballot in the 1998 general election. Sirkis was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 2011 and 2014. Sirkis was killed in a car crash on 10 July 2020 in Rio de Janeiro, aged 69.Morre o ex- deputado Alfredo Sirkis ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian writers Category:Brazilian environmentalists Category:Road accident deaths
title: Alfredo Sirkis
